Disindir Jokowi, Surya Paloh Sebut Itu Hanya Guyonan
07 Nov 2019, 03:37 by Budiarti Utami Putri, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Ketua Umum Partai NasDem Surya Paloh menganggap Presiden Joko Widodo atau Jokowi cuma bergurau saat menyinggung pertemuannya dengan Presiden Partai Keadilan Sejahtera Sohibul Iman. Surya tak menganggap ucapan Jokowi itu sebagai sindiran.
"Masa kalian enggak tangkap. Pak Jokowi itu punya sense of humor (selera humor) yang tinggi," kata Surya seraya terkekeh saat ditemui seusai perayaan HUT Partai Golkar di The Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Rabu malam, 6 November 2019.
Surya Paloh juga mengaku menerima dengan senang pernyataan Jokowi itu. Dia berulang kali berujar bahwa Jokowi hanya berkelakar.
Menurut Surya, komunikasi antarpemimpin partai baik koalisi maupun non koalisi memang harus terus terjalin dengan baik. Dia juga berujar semua partai harus menjalankan posisi dan peran bersama untuk meringankan beban masyarakat, bukan sebaliknya malah memberatkan.
"Ya kami tetap gembira lah, menerima apa ya, respons secara humoris yang begitu luar biasa dari Pak Jokowi ya," ujarnya.
Surya pun menilai terlalu naif jika pernyataan Jokowi diartikan sebagai peringatan agar NsasDem tak bermanuver. Kata dia, demokrasi Indonesia saat ini sudah maju sehingga praduga negatif sebaiknya dibuang jauh.
"Kalau dianggap suatu warning ya saya pikir terlalu naif kita," kata dia.
Jokowi sebelumnya menggoda Surya Paloh saat memberikan sambutan di acara HUT Partai Golkar ke-55. Jokowi mula-mula menyapa para tamu-tamu yang hadir seperti mantan wakil presiden Jusuf Kalla, dan para tokoh senior Golkar.
"Para Ketua Umum partai yang hadir. Bapak Surya Paloh yang kalau kita lihat malam hari ini lebih cerah dari biasanya. Sehabis pertemuan beliau dengan Pak Sohibul Iman di PKS," kata Jokowi di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Menurut Jokowi, wajah Surya yang terlihat lebih cerah karena habis berangkulan dengan Sohibul. Jokowi menilai rangkulan itu tidak seperti biasa.
"Saya tidak tahu maknanya tapi rangkulannya tidak biasa. Tidak pernah saya dirangkul seperti itu," ucap mantan gubernur DKI Jakarta ini.
Jokowi bercerita telah menanyakan maksud pertemuan Surya dengan petinggi partai oposisi pemerintah ini saat keduanya bertemu di ruang tunggu. "Saya tanya ada apa tapi jawabnya lain waktu. Saya tanya dong karena beliau masih di koalisi pemerintah," ucap dia.
Surya dan Sohibul bertemu pada Rabu, 30 Oktober 2019 di Kantor DPP PKS di Jalan TB Simatupang, Jakarta Selatan. Usai bertemu keduanya mengekspresikan kedekatannya dengan berangkulan.
BUDIARTI UTAMI PUTRI | AHMAD FAIZ
text:
Jokowi quipped, Surya Paloh Call It Just a Joke
Nov 7 2019, 03:37 by Budiarti Utami Putri, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Chairperson of the NasDem Party Surya Paloh considers President Joko Widodo or Jokowi to be joking as he mentions his meeting with President of the Prosperous Justice Party Sohibul Iman. Surya did not consider Jokowi's words as a satire.
"How come you guys didn't catch it. Pak Jokowi has a high sense of humor," Surya said, chuckling when he was met after the Golkar Party's birthday celebration at The Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday night, November 6, 2019.
Surya Paloh also admitted that he welcomed Jokowi's statement. He repeatedly said that Jokowi only joked.
According to Surya, communication between party leaders, both coalition and non-coalition must continue to be well established. He also said that all parties must carry out joint positions and roles to ease the burden on the community, not on the contrary it would be burdensome.
"Yes, we are still happy, what are we receiving, the humorous response that is so extraordinary from Mr. Jokowi," he said.
Surya also considered it too naive if Jokowi's statement was interpreted as a warning that NsasDem would not maneuver. He said, Indonesia's democracy had now progressed so negative presumptions should be discarded far.
"If it is considered a warning, then I think we are too naive," he said.
Jokowi had previously tempted Surya Paloh when giving a speech at the 55th Golkar Party anniversary. Jokowi first greeted the guests who attended such as former vice president Jusuf Kalla, and senior Golkar figures.
"The Chairmen of the party are present. Mr. Surya Paloh who if we see tonight is brighter than usual. After his meeting with Mr. Sohibul Iman at PKS," Jokowi said at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
According to Jokowi, Surya's face looked brighter because he had embraced with Sohibul. Jokowi considered the embrace to be unusual.
"I don't know the meaning but the embrace is unusual. I have never been embraced like that," said the former governor of DKI Jakarta.
Jokowi said that he had asked about the purpose of Surya's meeting with the leaders of the government opposition party when the two met in the waiting room. "I asked what was wrong, but he answered another time. I asked, because he was still in the government coalition," he said.
Surya and Sohibul met on Wednesday, October 30, 2019 at the PKS DPP Office on Jalan TB Simatupang, South Jakarta. After meeting the two expressed their closeness with embracing.
BUDIARTI UTAMI PUTRI | AHMAD FAIZ
